##Exploring the HILIC bacteria samples

#Import data

```{r}
setwd("M:/Summer_2016_metabolites/Methods_Paper_Samples/qc")

mydata.overloaded <- read_csv("M:/Summer_2016_metabolites/Methods_Paper_Samples/qc/QC.output.new.Bacteria_HILIC_160613_1to2_update_akb.csv")
mydata.overloaded <-mydata.overloaded[,2:11]
mydata <- mydata.overloaded %>% filter(!grepl("overload",Notes))
glimpse(mydata)
```

#Break Up the Names
```{r}
mydata_new <- mydata %>% separate(Replicate.Name, c("runData","type","ID","other1","other2"),"_")
```


#Normalize
```{r}
normalizeR <- function(x,IS.key = "D-Methionine"){
     x$AreaNorm <- x$Area/x$Area[which(x$Compound.Name==IS.key)]
     x
} 
```
